name: website-generator
description: AI-first full-stack website generator with Next.js frontend and NestJS backend

scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd frontend && pnpm install && cd ../backend && pnpm install
scripts.build:all: cd frontend && pnpm build && cd ../backend && pnpm build
scripts.lint:all: cd frontend && pnpm lint && cd ../backend && pnpm lint
scripts.format:all: cd frontend && pnpm format && cd ../backend && pnpm format
